docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The value of eating oat bran has been challenged by a small study that found oat fiber no more effective in lowering people's cholesterol levels than foods made from low-fiber refined wheat flour, which produced far fewer unpleasant side effects.

headline.main: Small Study Challenges Role of Oat Bran in Reducing Cholesterol
